title: New chroma packs not in the store?
body: They are advertised as avaliable but arent' in the store, is this just me or everyone?

replies.body:
Hello Lord Sesshomaru,

Sorry bout that, I completely missed the timing on this release. They are in the store now and thanks for the report.

Best,
Riot Cochese
Why aren't they the advertised price? http://fairtrade.com.au/ Doesn't like things which aren't the advertised price.

> [{quoted}](name=Suffocator,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9gpeIxv6,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-07-01T07:31:05.220+0000)
>
> Why aren't they the advertised price? http://fairtrade.com.au/ Doesn't like things which aren't the advertised price.

Hello Suffocator,

Sorry this seems like it's priced wrong. The chroma packs alone cost 590 RP, if you already own the Champion, and will display that way. If you do not own the Champion, the bundle includes the cost for all items together Champion+Chroma Pack. For example: Caitlyn Rebel Chroma Pack will display as 1470 RP (880 RP for Caitlyn + 590 RP for the chroma pack)

I hope that makes sense.

-Riot Cochese

Some Chroma Packs are for champions, some are for a skin. So for Headhunter Master Yi and Rocket Girl Tristana Chroma pack, you must own the champion and the specific skin before you can buy the 3 recolours for that specific skin for 590RP.

Maybe if every skin in the game could be chroma there would be a few that were worth it :s.
Hey thanks so much for letting me know :) the Chroma packs look awesome especially Zac GJ guys
